name: Deep Sea (PixelTeaGames, eFko)
description: You've gone overboard, but you built a raft and now need to  get past all of the sharks to make it to the island with the  hut! you will have three hearts and you will lose a heart every  time your raft gets hit by a shark so be careful!  (When you get in the game read the dialogue at the bottom left.)controls - (w a s d + space bar) (Art by Pit, programming by efko)
